Name: Chihuahua Margarita
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Tequila and grapefruit juice pepped up with a splash of agave nectar and dash of bitters. A tart and delicious tequila sour to pucker the palate.
History: Named after both the Mexican region of the same name and the dog breed, the Chihuahua is a Greyhound with tequila replacing gin.
Nutrition: One serving of Chihuahua Margarita contains 132 calories
